name: Swamp Knight
description: "Seen any vampires lately? You're welcome." - Swamp Knight

heroPerk.name: Unearthly Treat
heroPerk.description: Increases <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> vs. <ModifiedAttribute>Mist Monsters</> by up to <Number>142%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>.

commanderPerk.name: Unearthly Treat +
commanderPerk.description: Increases <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> vs. <ModifiedAttribute>Mist Monsters</> by up to <Number>142%</> based on the percentage of your missing <ModifiedAttribute>Health</>. In addition, taking damage has a <Number>45%</> chance to conjure a <ModifiedAttribute>Phantasm</> (targets a nearby enemy, dealing <Number>0.97</> base <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> damage in a 0.5 tile radius, <Number>1.5</> second cooldown).

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Slam a grenade into the ground, knocking back and dealing [Damage.Value] energy damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Shout an inspiring War Cry, granting nearby allies +1.45 weapon damage, +130 fire rate, and +120 melee attack speed for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Goin' Commando!!!
abilities.description: Equip a minigun which deals [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fires [FireRate.Value] shots per second. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.
